function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of conclusive research on urban design and environmental factors","Impact":"Ineffective planning and response strategies, potential for misinformation","Mitigation":"Conducting further research, integrating existing data, and seeking consensus among experts","Technologies":"Data analysis tools, modeling software, research collaboration platforms","People":"Public health officials, urban planners, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, international organizations"},{"Description":"Context-specific impacts of the pandemic","Impact":"Ineffective and uniform mitigation strategies, delayed response to emerging issues","Mitigation":"Developing context-specific integrated approaches, understanding local factors, and adaptive planning","Technologies":"Geospatial analysis tools, public health data platforms, data visualization software","People":"Local authorities, public health officials, urban planners","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations, community leaders"},{"Description":"Need for ongoing reviews and updates in pandemic research","Impact":"Outdated information, failure to anticipate emerging issues, missed opportunities for proactive measures","Mitigation":"Conducting regular reviews, updating research findings, and analyzing temporal evolution of evidence","Technologies":"Research collaboration platforms, data analysis tools, trend analysis software","People":"Researchers, public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, international organizations"}]}
